title.value: Provides list of documents which has delete audit events.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Research and Development Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

dql_value.value: select object_name, time_stamp, event_name, attribute_list, user_name, object_type, audited_obj_id, string_1, string_2, string_3, string_4, string_5 from dm_audittrail where ((event_name='d2_change_state_success' and string_1='Withdraw document' ) or event_name='d2_destroy') and time_stamp >= date('$value(from_date.MM/dd/yyyy)') and time_stamp <= date('$value(to_date.MM/dd/yyyy)')
